item.title: BBL ScatterBowl
item.description: Introducing ScatterBat! ScatterBowl displays every combination of wickets taken and runs conceded in Big Bash cricket. Every time that a new combination is scored, a blue square will colour in the space on the figure. Currently there have been 229 entries. ScatterBowl <- bowl %>% distinct(W,R, .keep_all = TRUE) %>% select(Season, Match.No, Bowling, W, R) colnames(ScatterBowl)[colnames(ScatterBowl) == 'Match.No'] <- 'Match' ggplot(ScatterBowl, aes(R,W)) + geom_bin2d(binwidth = c(0.
